name: aws-s3-connector
description: Amazon S3 storage integration with buckets, objects, presigned URLs, and multipart uploads
author: Hermetic Labs

card.title: AWS S3 Connector
card.description: Amazon S3 storage integration with presigned URLs and multipart uploads

summary.overview: Complete AWS S3 integration for bucket management, object CRUD operations, presigned URLs for secure sharing, and multipart uploads for large files.
summary.exampleUseCase: Upload patient records to S3 with automatic encryption, generate time-limited presigned URLs for secure sharing with external parties, and manage lifecycle policies for compliance retention.
summary.whatMakesThisDifferent: Runs locally with your AWS credentials - no third-party intermediary. Supports multipart uploads for files over 5GB and integrates with EVE's unified storage abstraction layer.
